plays.text: Penalty to Wade Redden 2 minutes for Holding Blake Sloan
Penalty to Craig Berube 2 minutes for High Sticking Zdeno Chara
Penalty to Denis Gauthier 2 minutes for Crosschecking Magnus Arvedson
Penalty to Shaun Van Allen 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Rob Niedermayer
2 minute Bench Penalty for Delay of Game served by Marian Hossa
Penalty to Bob Boughner 2 minutes for Elbowing Martin Havlat
Goal scored by Wade Redden assisted by Todd White
Penalty to Daniel Alfredsson 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Scott Nichol
Penalty to Jordan Leopold 2 minutes for Holding Marian Hossa
Penalty to Robyn Regehr 2 minutes for Holding Shaun Van Allen
Penalty to Steve Martins 2 minutes for High Sticking Scott Nichol
Penalty to Chris Neil 2 minutes for Boarding Robyn Regehr
Penalty to Shaun Van Allen 2 minutes for Hooking Jarome Iginla
Penalty to Martin Gelinas 2 minutes for Interference Shaun Van Allen
